description: Webhooks allow to be notified about events that happen in your Quaderno account. They can be created from the dashboard or via API.

auth_key.description: The endpoint's secret, used to generate webhook signatures.

created_at.description: Time at which the object was created.

events_sent.description: Number of events delivered to the endpoint.

events_types.description: The list of events to enable for this endpoint.

last_error.description: Description of the last error returned by the endpoint.

last_error_at.description: Time at which the endpoint returned the last error.

last_sent_at.description: Time at which the events were delivered for the last time.

url.description: The URL of the webhook endpoint.
